summary: An ordinance relating to the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary to establish the curb grades of Melrose Place, from Melrose Avenue to Howell Street, and of Howell Street, from Eastlake Avenue to Denny Way; and authorizing and directing the Corporation Counsel to limit by stipulation, the rights to be acquired by the City in order to minimize the damages in the condemnation proceeding provided for in Ordinance No. 47007 and amending Section 5 thereof.
